item.description:
This is one of my favorite places to kayak. If you have never been it is well worth the trip.
There are no houses around the reservoir. There is swimming, wildlife and plenty of room without running into anyone. The parking is limited so arriving there by 9:00 at the latest is probably best.

Some of us are camping up that way the night before and after, while others are renting rooms.Â  More details for those who sign up.

http://www.vtstateparks.com/htm/grriver.htm

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Kayak Green River Reservoir
